metadata.title: CVE-2023-6237 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
Excessive time spent checking invalid RSA public keys

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6237` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl3 - 3.0.10-1ubuntu2.2
openssl - 3.0.10-1ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openssl package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.10-1ubuntu2.2').
